data.name: ETHER VAPOR Remaster Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original soundtrack to the multi-perspective arcade shooting game ETHER VAPOR Remaster, created by Edelweiss and localized into English and published by Nyu Media Ltd.

Tracklist:

1. High Wind -Scene 1-
2. Approach -Boss #1-
3. Blue Ocean -Scene 2-
4. Ray Cyclone -Boss #2-
5. Vapor Thrust -Scene 3-
6. Dual Saber -Boss #3-
7. Huge Threat -Scene 4-
8. Megarachne -Boss #4-
9. Deep Layer -Scene 5-
10. DANIEL-ON -Boss #5-
11. Quater Spiral -Scene 6-
12. Back Attack -Boss #6a-
13. Decisive Battle -Boss #6b-
14. Overdrive -Boss #7-
15. Epilogue
16. Battle Again -Boss Rush-
17. [For GXSCC] High Wind -Scene 1-
18. [For GXSCC] Approach -Boss #1-
19. [For GXSCC] Blue Ocean -Scene 2-
20. [For GXSCC] Ray Cyclone -Boss #2-
21. [For GXSCC] Vapor Thrust -Scene 3-
22. [For GXSCC] Dual Saber -Boss #3-
23. [For GXSCC] Huge Threat -Scene 4-
24. [For GXSCC] Megarachne -Boss #4-
25. [For GXSCC] Deep Layer -Scene 5-
26. [For GXSCC] DANIEL-ON Boss #5-
27. [For GXSCC] Quater Spiral -Scene 6-
28. [For GXSCC] Back Attack -Boss #6a-
29. [For GXSCC] Decisive Battle -Boss #6b-
30. [For GXSCC] Overdrive -Boss #7-
31. [For GXSCC] Battle Again -Boss Rush-
